descriptionlist.description:
CyberKit Fennec allows you to test CyberKit using Firefox for iOS.
This release is for iOS 14. If you're not on iOS 14, you should install a release for your iOS.
Please report any bugs you find on GitHub.
If you have not configured CyberKit before, please see GitHub for jetsam configuration instructions. Failure to complete this step will result in a crash.

changelog.change: Updated WebKit from 7616.1.7 branch to 7616.1.12 branch
Bundle internationalization instead of using potentially older system data, and other iOS 12 work
